mapper.insert: insert into comment(post_id, member_id, content) values(#{postId}, #{memberId}, #{content})
mapper.select: select C.comment_id as commentId , C.post_id as postId, C.member_id as memberId , C.content , C.created_at as createdAt, M.name as name from comment as C, member as M where C.member_id = M.member_id and C.post_id = #{postId} order by commentId desc
mapper.delete: delete from comment where comment_id = #{commentId} and member_id = #{memberId}
